nodes.text: Imperial Specialists Personnel Expansion is an expansion to Star Wars: Legion, an asymmetrical two player infantry-based wargame published by Fantasy Flight Games. As indicated by the name, it includes four scale models of various specialists in the military forces of the Galactic Empire. It was first announced on October 9, 2018 alongside the Rebel Specialists Personnel Expansion and published in January 2019.
Armies are more than just soldiers. To wage an effective war across the countless battlefields of the Galactic Civil War, the Galactic Empire needs recruits who can do more than fight.

This expansion for Star Wars: Legion contains four finely sculpted Imperial specialist miniatures, along with new unit, upgrade and command cards. This expansion allows a player to field a generic Imperial commander unit and to add a comms specialist, medical droid, and astromech droid to other units in their army.
